languages.text: {n}Равор морщится словно от зубной боли.{/n} "Вроде слыхал, да... только вот деталей не припомню. Ха, а не связан ли он с той операцией, что курировал покойник Морт? Если с ней, то ничего я про то не знаю, Лорд-капитан — в секрете ее держали. Разве только Высокий фактотум что-то скажет — глядишь, в его переписях казенных и найдется упоминание".

{n}Ravor winces as if in pain.{/n} "I've heard the name, that much I'm sure of... but I can't recall the details. Ha... I wonder if it was part of that operation that the late Mort was put in charge of. If it was, then there's nothing I can tell you, Lord Cap'n. The whole thing was kept under wraps. Your best chance would be to ask the High Factotum — maybe some of his treasury records have mentions of this 'Fiery Reckoning.'"
languages.original_text: {n}Равор морщится словно от зубной боли.{/n} "Вроде слыхал, да... только вот деталей не припомню. Ха, а не связан ли он с той операцией, что курировал покойник Морт? I wonder if it was part of that operation that the late Mort was put in charge of. If it was, then there's nothing I can tell you, Lord Captain. The whole thing was kept under wraps. Your best chance would be to ask the High Factotum — maybe some of his treasury records have mentions of this 'Fiery Reckoning.'"

languages.text: {n}雷沃皱起了眉头，似乎这个名字让他感到痛苦。{/n}“我听说过这个名字，这一点我相当确定……不过所有的细节我都想不起来了，哈……不知道这艘船原本是不是由死了的莫特负责。如果是的话，那恐怕我也提供不了什么有用的情报，船长老大。整件事情都是高度保密的，你最好去问问高阶顾问试试，说不定他的一部分财务记录中会提到这个‘烈焰之怒号’。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor winces as if in pain.{/n} "I've heard the name, that much I'm sure of... but I can't recall the details. Ha... I wonder if it was part of that operation that the late Mort was put in charge of. If it was, then there's nothing I can tell you, Lord Cap'n. The whole thing was kept under wraps. Your best chance would be to ask the High Factotum — maybe some of his treasury records have mentions of this 'Fiery Reckoning.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}雷沃皱起了眉头，似乎这个名字让他感到痛苦。{/n}“我听说过这个名字，这一点我相当确定……不过所有的细节我都想不起来了，哈……不知道这艘船原本是不是由死了的莫特负责。如果是的话，那恐怕我也提供不了什么有用的情报，船长老大。整件事情都是高度保密的，你最好去问问高阶顾问试试，说不定他的一部分财务记录中会提到这个‘烈焰之怒号’。”

languages.text: {n}Ravor ne peut réprimer une grimace.{/n} « Je suis sûr d'avoir déjà entendu ce nom quelque part... mais où... Ha... ! Je me demande si c'était pas en rapport avec cette opération dont feu Mort avait la charge. Si c'est bien ça, alors je peux pas trop vous aider, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Toute cette opération était confidentielle. Vous devriez plutôt tenter votre chance avec le haut factotum. Peut-être qu'il aura trace de ce Jugement Ardent dans ses précieuses archives. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor winces as if in pain.{/n} "I've heard the name, that much I'm sure of... but I can't recall the details. Ha... I wonder if it was part of that operation that the late Mort was put in charge of. If it was, then there's nothing I can tell you, Lord Cap'n. The whole thing was kept under wraps. Your best chance would be to ask the High Factotum — maybe some of his treasury records have mentions of this 'Fiery Reckoning.'"

Je me demande si c'était pas en rapport avec cette opération dont feu Mort avait la charge. Si c'est bien ça, alors je peux pas trop vous aider, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Toute cette opération était confidentielle. Vous devriez plutôt tenter votre chance avec le haut factotum. Peut-être qu'il aura trace de ce Jugement Ardent dans ses précieuses archives. »

languages.text: {n}Ravor hace una mueca de dolor.{/n} «He oído el nombre, estoy seguro... pero no recuerdo los detalles. Mmm... me pregunto si tendría que ver con la operación que estaba dirigiendo Mort antes de morir. Si es así, Lord Capi, no puedo decirle nada. Era todo más que secreto. Lo mejor será que pregunte al Sumo Factótum. A lo mejor en sus registros de tesorería viene algo sobre ese "Juicio Abrasador"».
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor winces as if in pain.{/n} "I've heard the name, that much I'm sure of... but I can't recall the details. Ha... I wonder if it was part of that operation that the late Mort was put in charge of. If it was, then there's nothing I can tell you, Lord Cap'n. The whole thing was kept under wraps. Your best chance would be to ask the High Factotum — maybe some of his treasury records have mentions of this 'Fiery Reckoning.'"

Mmm... me pregunto si tendría que ver con la operación que estaba dirigiendo Mort antes de morir. Si es así, Lord Capi, no puedo decirle nada. Era todo más que secreto. Lo mejor será que pregunte al Sumo Factótum. A lo mejor en sus registros de tesorería viene algo sobre ese "Juicio Abrasador"».

languages.text: {n}ラヴォアは苦しそうに顔をしかめる。{/n}「名前は聞いたことはありますが…詳細は思い出せませんね。あっ…今は亡き、モートが担当していた作戦の一部だったのかもしれません。そうであれば、私からお伝えできることは何もありませんよ、ロード・キャプテン。すべては秘密裏に進められていました。ハイ・ファクトタムに尋ねてみるのが一番いいかと…彼の宝物庫になら<灼炎の罰>に関する記録があるかもしれません」
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor winces as if in pain.{/n} "I've heard the name, that much I'm sure of... but I can't recall the details. Ha... I wonder if it was part of that operation that the late Mort was put in charge of. If it was, then there's nothing I can tell you, Lord Cap'n. The whole thing was kept under wraps. Your best chance would be to ask the High Factotum — maybe some of his treasury records have mentions of this 'Fiery Reckoning.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}ラヴォアは苦しそうに顔をしかめる。{/n}「名前は聞いたことはありますが…詳細は思い出せませんね。あっ…今は亡き、モートが担当していた作戦の一部だったのかもしれません。そうであれば、私からお伝えできることは何もありませんよ、ロード・キャプテン。すべては秘密裏に進められていました。ハイ・ファクトタムに尋ねてみることが一番ですかね…<灼炎の罰>に関する記録が、宝物庫にならあるかもしれません」

languages.text: {n}Ravor zuckt zusammen, als hätte er Schmerzen.{/n} "Ich kenne den Namen, das weiß ich gewiss ... aber ich erinnere mich nicht an Details. Ha ... Vielleicht war es Teil der Operation, die der verstorbene Mort leiten sollte. Wenn dem so ist, kann ich Euch nichts sagen, Lord Cap'n. Das Ganze war streng geheim. Fragt am besten einmal das Hoch-Faktotum, vielleicht findet sich in seinen Büchern eine Erwähnung dieser 'Fiery Reckoning'."
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor winces as if in pain.{/n} "I've heard the name, that much I'm sure of... but I can't recall the details. Ha... I wonder if it was part of that operation that the late Mort was put in charge of. If it was, then there's nothing I can tell you, Lord Cap'n. The whole thing was kept under wraps. Your best chance would be to ask the High Factotum — maybe some of his treasury records have mentions of this 'Fiery Reckoning.'"

Fragt am besten einmal das Hoch-Faktotum, vielleicht findet sich in seinen Büchern eine Erwähnung dieser 'Fiery Reckoning'."

languages.text: {n}Ravor, acı içindeymiş gibi yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "İsmini işitmiştim, o kadarından eminim... Ama ayrıntı hatırlamıyorum. Acaba rahmetli Mort'a emanet edilen operasyonun mu parçasıydı? Öyleyse anlatabileceğim bir şey yok Lord Kaptan. O faaliyete dair her şey gizli kapaklı yapıldı. Arşıkâhya'ya sormanız daha yerinde olacaktır. Tuttuğu hazine kayıtlarında 'Kıyamet Kadırgası' ismi geçiyor olabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor winces as if in pain.{/n} "I've heard the name, that much I'm sure of... but I can't recall the details. Ha...
